src: Achtzehn Prozent der Venezolaner sind arbeitslos und die meisten Beschäftigten arbeiten in der Schattenwirtschaft. Zwei Drittel der arbeitenden Venezolaner arbeiten im Dienstleistungsbereich, fast ein Viertel in der Industrie und ein Fünftel in der Landwirtschaft. Ein wichtiger Industriezweig für die Venezolaner ist das Erdöl. Obwohl nur ein Prozent der Beschäftigten in der Erdölindustrie tätig ist, ist das Land hier ein Nettoexporteur.
mt: 18% of Venezuelans are unemployed and most employed Venezuelans work in the informal economy. Two-thirds of working Venezuelans work in the service sector, almost a quarter in industry and one-fifth in agriculture. An important industry for Venezuelans is oil. Although only 1% of workers are active in the oil industry, the country is a net exporter here.
ref: Eighteen percent of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who are employed work in the informal economy. Two thirds of Venezuelans who work do so in the service sector, nearly a quarter work in industry and a fifth work in agriculture. An important industry for Venezuelans is oil, where the country is a net exporter, even though only one percent work in the oil industry.

src: Durch die Energie, die produziert wird, wenn Wasserstoffatome verschmolzen (oder fusioniert) werden, um schwerere Elemente zu formen, geben Sterne Licht und Wärme ab. Wissenschaftler arbeiten daran, einen Reaktor zu entwickeln, der auf dieselbe Weise Energie erzeugen kann. Dies ist jedoch eine äußerst schwierige Aufgabe, so dass es viele Jahre dauern wird, bevor tatsächlich nutzbare Fusionsreaktoren gebaut werden.
mt: By the energy produced when hydrogen atoms are fused (or fused) to form heavier elements, stars emit light and heat. Scientists are working to develop a reactor that can produce energy in the same way. However, this is an extremely difficult task, so it will take many years before usable fusion reactors can be built.
ref: Stars give off light and heat because of the energy made when hydrogen atoms are merged (or fused) together to form heavier elements. Scientists are working to create a reactor that can make energy in the same way. This, however, is a very hard problem to solve and will take many years before we see useful fusion reactors built.

src: Elemente und Verbindungen können von einem Zustand in einen anderen übergehen und sich nicht verändern. Stickstoff als Gas hat immer noch die gleichen Eigenschaften wie flüssiger Stickstoff. Der flüssige Zustand ist dichter, die Moleküle sind jedoch dieselben. Wasser ist ein weiteres Beispiel. Die Verbindung Wasser besteht aus zwei Wasserstoffatomen und einem Sauerstoffatom. Es hat die gleiche Molekularstruktur, egal ob es gasförmig, flüssig oder fest ist. Obwohl sich sein Aggregatzustand ändern kann, bleibt der chemische Zustand derselbe.
mt: Elements and compounds can change from one state to another and not change. Nitrogen as a gas still has the same properties as liquid nitrogen. The liquid state is denser, but the molecules are the same. Water is another example. The water compound consists of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom. It has the same molecular structure whether it is gaseous, liquid, or solid. Although its state of aggregation can change, the chemical state remains the same.
ref: Elements and compounds can move from one state to another and not change. Nitrogen as a gas still has the same properties as liquid nitrogen. The liquid state is denser but the molecules are still the same. Water is another example. The compound water is made up of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom. It has the same molecular structure whether it is a gas, liquid, or solid. Although its physical state may change, its chemical state remains the same.

It has the same molecular structure whether it is a gas, liquid, or solid. Although its physical state may change, its chemical state remains the same.

src: Während der Revolutionskämpfe formten die 13 Bundesstaaten auf Basis des Bundesvertrages zuerst eine schwache Zentralregierung, die nur aus dem Kongress bestand. Der Kongress war nicht befugt, Steuern zu erheben, und da es weder eine nationale Exekutive noch eine nationale Justiz gab, verließ er sich bei der Durchsetzung all seiner Gesetze auf die Behörden der Bundesstaaten, die oftmals nicht kooperierten. Er hatte zudem keine Befugnis, Steuergesetze und Zölle zwischen Bundesstaaten außer Kraft zu setzen. Die Artikel erforderten die einstimmige Zustimmung aller Staaten, bevor sie geändert werden konnten, und die Staaten nahmen die Zentralregierung so wenig ernst, dass ihre Repräsentanten oftmals abwesend waren.
mt: During the Revolutionary War, the 13 states formed a weak central government based on the Articles of Confederation. The Congress had no power to levy taxes, and since there was neither a national executive nor a national judiciary, it relied on the state governments to enforce its laws, which often did not cooperate. It also had no power to invalidate state tax laws and tariffs. The Articles required the unanimous consent of all states before they could be amended, and the states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.
ref: During the Revolutionary War, the thirteen states first formed a weak central government—with the Congress being its only component—under the Articles of Confederation. Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on state authorities, who were often uncooperative, to enforce all its acts. It also had no authority to override tax laws and tariffs between states. The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.

src: Wenn Sie den Film „Das Vermächtnis der Tempelritter“ gesehen haben, denken Sie vielleicht, dass auf die Rückseite der Unabhängigkeitserklärung eine Schatzkarte gezeichnet wurde. Das stimmt allerdings nicht. Obwohl auf der Rückseite des Schriftstücks etwas geschrieben steht, handelt es sich nicht um eine Schatzkarte. Auf die Rückseite der Unabhängigkeitserklärung waren die Worte „ursprüngliche Unabhängigkeitserklärung, datiert auf den 4. Juli 1776“ geschrieben. Der Text befindet sich kopfüber an der Unterseite des Dokuments. Zwar weiß niemand mit Sicherheit, wer es geschrieben hat, es ist allerdings bekannt, dass das große Pergamentdokument (welches 29¾ Zoll x 24½ Zoll misst) zu Beginn seines Lebens zur Aufbewahrung zusammengerollt wurde. Es ist also möglich, dass der Vermerk einfach als Kennzeichnung hinzugefügt wurde.
mt: If you have seen the movie "The Da Vinci Code", you might think that a treasure map was drawn on the back of the Declaration of Independence. That is not true, however. Although something was written on the back of the document, it was not a treasure map. The words "original Declaration of Independence, dated 4th July, 1776" were written on the back of the document. The text is upside down at the bottom of the document. While no one knows for sure who wrote it, it is known that the large parchment document (which measures 29¾ x 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage at the beginning of its life. It is possible, therefore, that the annotation was simply added as a mark.
ref: "If you have watched the movie National Treasure, you may think a treasure map was written on the back of the Declaration of Independence. However, that is not true. Although there is something written on the back of the document, it is not a treasure map. Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words ""Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776"". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down. While no one knows for certain who wrote it, it is known that early in its life, the large parchment document (it measures 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage. So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label."

src: Früh in der Unabhängigkeit der Nation half die Expertise des botanischen Gartens von Singapur dabei, die Insel in eine tropische Gartenstadt zu verwandeln. Vanda Miss Joaquim, eine Orchideenkreuzung, wurde im Jahr 1981 zur Nationalblume des Landes gekürt.
mt: Early in the nation's independence, the expertise of the Singapore Botanic Gardens helped transform the island into a tropical garden city. Vanda Miss Joaquim, a hybrid orchid, was crowned the country's national flower in 1981.
ref: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City. In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.

src: Obwohl der Bau von Pyramiden aus Stein bis zum Ende des Alten Reiches fortgesetzt wurde, wurden die Pyramiden von Gizeh in ihrer Größe und der technischen Perfektion ihrer Konstruktion nie übertroffen. Ägypter im antiken Neuen Reich bestaunten die Monumente ihrer Vorfahren, die damals gut tausend Jahre alt waren.
mt: Although the construction of pyramids from stone continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the pyramids of Giza were never surpassed in size and the technical perfection of their construction. Egyptians in the ancient New Kingdom admired the monuments of their forebears, which were then over a thousand years old.
ref: Although pyramid-building in stone continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the pyramids of Giza were never surpassed in their size and the technical excellence of their construction. New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over a thousand year old.

src: Jedes Jahr um den Oktober herum ziehen fast 1,5 Millionen Pflanzenfresser in die südlichen Ebenen und überqueren den Fluss Mara aus den nördlichen Hügeln wegen der Regenfälle. Und dann zurück in den Norden durch den Westen, mit einer erneuten Überquerung des Flusses Mara nach den Regenfällen im April. Zum Serengeti-Gebiet gehört der Serengeti-Nationalpark, das Ngorongoro-Reservat und der Maswe-Wildpark in Tansania sowie der Maasai-Mara-Nationalpark in Kenia.
mt: 1.5 million herbivores cross the Mara River every October, coming from the northern hills to the southern plains for the rainy season. And then back to the north through the west, with another crossing of the Mara River after the rainy season in April. The Serengeti ecosystem includes the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Reserve and the Masai Mara National Park in Kenya.
ref: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains. And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April. The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.

src: Nachdem die Schlacht um Frankreich beendet war, bereitete sich Deutschland auf die Invasion der britischen Insel vor. Deutschland verlieh der Attacke den Decknamen „Unternehmen Seelöwe“. Der Großteil der schweren Waffen und Vorräte der britischen Armee waren bei der Evakuation aus Dünkirchen verlorengegangen, die Armee war also ziemich geschwächt. Aber die Royal Navy war trotzdem noch viel stärker als die deutsche Marine („Kriegsmarine“) und hätte jede Invasionsflotte, die über den englischen Kanal geschickt worden wäre, zerstören können. Allerdings waren nur sehr wenige Schiffe der Königlichen Marine in der Nähe der wahrscheinlichen Invasionsrouten stationiert, da die Admirale befürchteten, dass sie bei einem deutschen Luftangriff versenkt werden könnten.
mt: After the Battle of France was over, Germany prepared for the invasion of the British Isles. Germany gave the attack the codename "Operation Sealion". Most of the heavy weapons and supplies of the British Army were lost in the evacuation of Dunkirk, so the army was weakened. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy ("Kriegsmarine") and would have been able to destroy any invasion fleet that was sent across the English Channel. However, only a few ships of the Royal Navy were stationed near the likely invasion routes, as the admirals feared that they would be sunk in a German air attack.
ref: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain. Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel. However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.

src: Beginnen wir mit einer Erläuterung der italienischen Pläne. Italien war in erster Linie der „kleine Bruder“ von Deutschland und Japan. Es hatte eine schwächere Armee und eine schwächere Marine, obwohl man erst kurz vor Beginn des Krieges vier neue Schiffe gebaut hatte. Die Hauptziele Italiens waren afrikanische Länder. Um diese Länder zu erobern, brauchten sie einen Startplatz für die Truppen, damit die Truppen über das Mittelmeer segeln und in Afrika einmarschieren konnten. Dafür mussten sie britische Stützpunkte und Schiffe in Ägypten eliminieren. Abgesehen davon sollte Italiens Schlachtschiffen keine weitere Rolle zukommen. Nun zu Japan. Japan war eine Inselstaat, genau wie Großbritannien.
mt: Let us begin with an explanation of the Italian plans. Italy was primarily the "little brother" of Germany and Japan. It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although it had built four new ships just before the start of the war. Italy's main targets were African countries. In order to conquer these countries, they needed a base for their troops, so that the troops could sail across the Mediterranean and march into Africa. In addition, they had to eliminate British bases and ships in Egypt. Apart from that, Italy's battleships were to play no further role. Now to Japan. Japan was an island state, just like Great Britain.
ref: "Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the ""little brother"" of Germany and Japan. It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war. Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa. For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain."

src: "Die Landung am D-Day und die darauffolgenden Gefechte haben den Norden Frankreichs befreit, aber der Süden war noch immer nicht frei. ""Er wurde von den „Vichy""""-Franzosen beherrscht. Dies waren Franzosen, die im Jahr 1940 mit den Deutschen Frieden geschlossen hatten und mit den Eroberern arbeiteten, anstatt sie zu bekämpfen."" Am 15. August 1940 fielen die Alliierten in Südfrankreich ein; die Invasion wurde „Operation Dragoon“ genannt. Nach nur zwei Wochen hatten die Amerikaner und die französischen Befreiungstruppen den Süden Frankreichs befreit und wandten sich Richtung Deutschland."
mt: "The landing on D-Day and the subsequent battles freed northern France, but the south was still not free. It was controlled by the "Vichy" French. These were French who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders, instead of fighting them."" On August 15, 1940, the Allies invaded southern France; the invasion was called "Operation Dragoon". After only two weeks, the Americans and the French liberation troops had freed southern France and turned towards Germany."
ref: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

src: U-Boote sind Schiffe, die dazu bestimmt sind, unter Wasser zu fahren und dort für eine längere Zeit zu bleiben. U-Boote wurden im Ersten und Zweiten Weltkrieg eingesetzt. Damals waren sie sehr langsam und verfügten über eine sehr begrenzte Schussweite. Zu Beginn des Krieges bewegten sie sich meist an der Meeresoberfläche, aber als sich das Radar weiterentwickelte und immer genauer wurde, waren die U-Boote zum Abtauchen gezwungen, um nicht gesehen zu werden. Das Wort U-Boot wurde in der Version „U-Boat“ auch im Englischen verwendet, womit speziell deutsche U-Boote gemeint waren. Die Deutschen waren sehr gut darin, ihre U-Boote zu navigieren und zu steuern. Wegen ihres Erfolges mit U-Booten vertraute man den Deutschen nach dem Krieg nicht, viele davon zu besitzen.
mt: Submarines are ships designed to stay underwater for a long time. Submarines were used in the First and Second World War. At the beginning of the war they were very slow and had a very limited range. At the beginning of the war they mostly moved on the surface of the sea, but as the radar developed and became more accurate, the submarines were forced to dive to avoid being seen. The word U-Boot was also used in English as „U-Boat“, meaning specifically German submarines. The Germans were very good at navigating and steering their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war many people did not trust the Germans to have any.
ref: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: Am 17. September 1939 war die polnische Verteidigung bereits völlig zusammengebrochen und die einzige Hoffnung bestand in einem Rückzug und einer Neuaufstellung entlang des rumänischen Brückenkopfes. Diese Pläne wurden jedoch fast über Nacht obsolet, als über 800.000 Soldaten der Roten Armee der Sowjetunion in die weißrussischen und ukrainischen Fronten eindrangen und diese schufen, nachdem sie in Verletzung des Friedensvertrags von Riga, des sowjetisch-polnischen Nichtangriffspakts und anderer bilateraler und multilateraler internationaler Verträge in die östlichen Regionen Polens eingedrungen waren.
mt: 17 September 1939, the Polish defense was already completely collapsed and the only hope was in a retreat and a reorganization along the Romanian bridgehead. These plans were however almost overnight obsolete, when over 800,000 soldiers of the Red Army of the Soviet Union invaded the White Russian and Ukrainian fronts and created, after they had violated the Peace Treaty of Riga, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact and other bilateral and multilateral international treaties, the eastern regions of Poland.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: Es lief fast von Anfang an nicht gut für die Italiener in Nordafrika. Innerhalb einer Woche nach Italiens Kriegserklärung am 10. Juni 1940 hatte das 11. Husarenregiment der Briten Fort Capuzzo in Libyen eingenommen. Bei einem Überfall im Osten von Bardia ergriffen die Briten den Chefingenieur der italienischen Zehnten Armee, General Lastucci. Am 28. Juni wurde Marshall Italo Balbo, der Generalgouverneur Libyens und mutmaßliche Nachfolger Mussolinis, versehentlich durch Beschuss der eigenen Truppen getötet, während er in Tobruk landete.
mt: It went almost from the start not well for the Italians in North Africa. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the 11th Hussars of the British had captured Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an attack in the east of Bardia, the British took the chief engineer of the Italian Tenth Army, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and presumed successor to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: Es lief fast von Anfang an nicht gut für die Italiener in Nordafrika. Innerhalb einer Woche nach Italiens Kriegserklärung am 10. Juni 1940 hatte das 11. Husarenregiment der Briten Fort Capuzzo in Libyen eingenommen. Bei einem Überfall im Osten von Bardia ergriffen die Briten den Chefingenieur der italienischen Zehnten Armee, General Lastucci. Am 28. Juni wurde Marshall Italo Balbo, der Generalgouverneur Libyens und mutmaßliche Nachfolger Mussolinis, versehentlich durch Beschuss der eigenen Truppen getötet, während er in Tobruk landete.
mt: It went almost from the start not well for the Italians in North Africa. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the 11th Hussars of the British had captured Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an attack in the east of Bardia, the British took the chief engineer of the Italian Tenth Army, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and presumed successor to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: Der tibetanische Buddhismus basiert auf den Lehren Buddhas, wurde aber um den Pfad der Liebe des Mahayana und zahlreiche Techniken des indischen Yoga erweitert. Im Prinzip ist der tibetische Buddhismus sehr einfach. Er besteht aus Kundalini Yoga, Meditation und dem Pfad der allumfassenden Liebe. Mit Kundalini-Yoga wird die Kundalini-Energie (Aufklärungsenergie) durch Yoga-Posen, Atemübungen, Mantras und Visualisierungen erweckt. Im Zentrum der tibetischen Meditation steht das Götter-Yoga. Durch die Visualisierung verschiedener Gottheiten werden die Energiekanäle gereinigt, die Chakren geöffnet und das erleuchtete Bewusstsein entsteht.
mt: Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but was expanded by the path of love of Mahayana and numerous techniques of Indian yoga. In principle, Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-encompassing love. With Kundalini Yoga, the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga poses, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. At the center of Tibetan meditation is the god yoga. By visualizing various deities, the energy channels are cleansed, the chakras are opened and the enlightened consciousness arises.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: Das Programm begann um 20:30 Ortszeit (15:00 UTC). Berühmte Sänger im ganzen Land präsentierten Bhajans, Andachtslieder, zu Shri Shyams Füßen. Der Sänger Sanju Sharma eröffnete den Abend, gefolgt von Jai Shankar Choudhary, der ebenfalls den Chhappan Bhog Bhajan präsentierte. Begleitet wurde er vom Sänger Raju Khandelwal. Dann übernahm Lakkha Singh die Leitung beim Singen der Bhajans. Baba Shyam wurden 108 Teller Chhappan Bhog (im Hinduismus 56 verschiedene essbare Dinge wie Süßigkeiten, Früchte, Nüsse, Gerichte usw., die der Gottheit dargebracht werden) serviert. Lakkha Singh präsentierte den Chhappan Bhog Bhajan ebenfalls. Der Sänger Raju Khandelwal begleitete ihn.
mt: The program began at 8:30 pm local time (3:00 pm UTC). Famous singers from all over the country presented Bhajans, devotional songs, at the feet of Shri Shyam. Singer Sanju Sharma opened the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary, who also presented the Chhappan Bhog Bhajan. He was accompanied by singer Raju Khandelwal. Then Lakkha Singh took over the leadership in singing the Bhajans. Baba Shyam were served 108 bowls of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism 56 different edible things such as sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc., which are offered to the deity). Lakkha Singh also presented the Chhappan Bhog Bhajan. Singer Raju Khandelwal accompanied him.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: "Die Feiern begannen mit einer besonderen Show der weltbekannten Gruppe Cirque du Soleil. Es folgten das Staatliche Sinfonieorchester Istanbul, eine Janitscharenkapelle und die Sänger Fatih Erkoç und Müslüm Gürses. Dann traten drehende Derwische auf. Die türkische Diva Sezen Aksu trat mit dem italienischen Tenor Alessandro Safina und der griechischen Sängerin Haris Alexiou auf. ""Abschließend bot das türkische Tanzensemble Feuer von Anatolien die Vorführung """"Troja"""" dar."""
mt: "The celebrations began with a special show by the world-famous Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the State Symphony Orchestra of Istanbul, a Janissary band and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then came the whirling dervishes. The Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and the Greek singer Haris Alexiou. ""Finally, the Turkish dance ensemble Fire from Anatolia presented the show """"Troy""""."""
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: Die Passagiere bekamen Wasser, während sie bei 90 °F (32 °C) warteten.x Feuerwehrhauptmann Scott Kouns sagte: „Es war ein heißer Tag in der Santa Clara mit Temperaturen von 90° F (30° C) und aufwärts. Jeder Zeitraum, den man auf einer Achterbahn gefangen ist, wäre – gelinde gesagt – unangenehm und es dauerte mindestens eine Stunde, um die erste Person vom Fahrgeschäft zu holen.“
mt: Passengers were given water while they waited at 90 °F (32 °C). Fire Captain Scott Kouns said: "It was a hot day in Santa Clara with temperatures of 90 °F (30 °C) and up. Any time period you're stuck on a roller coaster would be – at best – uncomfortable and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: Laut dem aktuellen Bulletin deuteten die Messungen des Meeresspiegels darauf hin, dass ein Tsunami ausgelöst wurde. In der Nähe von Pago Pago und Niue wurde eine eindeutige Tsunami-Aktivität aufgezeichnet. Es wurden keine nennenswerten Schäden oder Verletzungen aus Tonga vermeldet. Doch der Strom fiel zeitweise aus, was Berichten zufolge der Grund dafür war, dass die tongaischen Behörden die Tsunami-Warnung des PTWC nicht erhalten hatten. Vierzehn Schulen in Hawaii, die an oder in der Nähe von Küsten liegen, waren den ganzen Mittwoch geschlossen, obwohl die Warnungen aufgehoben worden waren.
mt: According to the latest bulletin, the sea level measurements indicated that a tsunami was triggered.  A clear tsunami activity was recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.  No significant damage or injuries were reported from Tonga.  However, the power went out for a while, which according to reports was the reason why the Tongan authorities did not receive the tsunami warning from the PTWC.  Fourteen schools in Hawaii, which are located on or near the coast, were closed all Wednesday, although the warnings were lifted.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Jonny Reid, Beifahrer für das A1GP-Team Neuseeland, hat heute Geschichte geschrieben, als er legal in neuer Rekordzeit über die 48 Jahre alte Auckland Harbour Bridge in Neuseeland gefahren ist. Reid schaffte es, Neuseelands A1GP-Auto Black Beauty sieben Mal mit Geschwindigkeiten von über 160 km/h über die Brücke zu fahren. Die neuseeländische Polizei hatte wegen der geringen Höhe von Black Beauty Schwierigkeiten, die Geschwindigkeit Reids mit ihren Radarpistolen zu erfassen, und es gelang ihr nur ein einziges Mal, die Geschwindigkeit zu messen, als Reid auf 160 km/h abbremste.
mt: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the New Zealand A1GP team, made history today when he legally drove over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge in New Zealand in a new record time. Reid managed to drive New Zealand's A1GP car Black Beauty seven times over the bridge at speeds of over 160 km/h. The New Zealand police had trouble measuring Reid's speed with their radar guns because of the low height of Black Beauty, and they were only able to measure it once, when Reid slowed down to 160 km/h.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: Ein mittleres Erdbeben erschütterte am Montag um 22:08 Uhr den Westen Montanas. Keine unmittelbaren Berichte über Schäden gingen beim United States Geological Survey (USGS) und dem dazugehörigen National Earthquake Information Center ein. Das Zentrum des Erdbebens befand sich etwa 20 km (15 Meilen) nordnordöstlich von Dillon und etwa 65 km (40 Meilen) südlich von Butte.
mt: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana on Monday at 10:08 p.m. No immediate reports of damage came in to the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The epicenter of the earthquake was about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: Das Abu-Ghraib-Gefängnis im Irak ist während eines Aufruhrs in Brand gesetzt worden. Das Gefängnis wurde berüchtigt, nachdem dort nach der Übernahme durch US-Streitkräfte Misshandlungen von Gefangenenen aufgedeckt wurden.
mt: The Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq was set on fire during a riot. The prison was notorious after mistreatment of prisoners was uncovered after it was taken over by US forces.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: Die Band brach den Auftritt im War-Memorial-Stadion von Maui ab, der von 9.000 Leuten besucht werden sollte, und entschuldigte sich bei den Fans. Die Managementfirma der Band, HK Management Inc., gab keinen anfänglichen Grund an, als sie am 20. September absagte, machte aber bereits am nächsten Tag logistische Gründe dafür verantwortlich.
mt: The band abruptly ended its performance at the War Memorial Stadium on Maui, which was expected to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to the fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when it canceled on September 20, but made logistical reasons responsible the next day.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: "Berichten zufolge dauerten ausgedehnte Plünderungen die Nacht über an, während Polizeibeamte keine Präsenz auf den Straßen Bischkeks zeigten. ""Der Beschreibung eines Beobachters zufolge verfiel Bischkek mehr und mehr in einen Zustand der „Anarchie"""", als Banden von Menschen durch die Straßen zogen und Konsumgüterläden plünderten."" Mehrere Einwohner von Bishkek gaben den Demonstranten aus dem Süden die Schuld an der Gesetzlosigkeit."
mt: "According to reports, looting continued throughout the night as police were not present on the streets of Bishkek. ""The description of an eyewitness showed Bishkek more and more falling into a state of "anarchy"""", as gangs of people roamed the streets and looted consumer goods stores."" Several residents of Bishkek blamed the looting on the demonstrators from the south."
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: Rings CEO Jamie Siminoff sagte einmal, dass er das Unternehmen gegründet habe, nachdem er von seiner Garagenwerkstatt aus seine Türklingel nicht hören konnte. Er sagte, dass er eine WLAN-Türklingel gebaut habe. Siminoff sagte, die Verkäufe seien nach seinem Auftritt in einer Folge von „Shark Tank“ im Jahre 2013 stark gestiegen, obwohl die Jury der Sendung die Finanzierung seines Start-ups abgelehnt hatte. Ende 2017 trat Siminoff im Teleshopping-Sender QVC auf. Ring hat außerdem eine Rechtsstreitigkeit mit der konkurrierenden Sicherheitsfirma ADT Corporation beigelegt.
mt: Rings CEO Jamie Siminoff once said he founded the company after not being able to hear his garage door from his workshop. He said he built a Wi-Fi garage door opener. Siminoff said sales increased after his appearance on the reality show Shark Tank in 2013, even though the show's panel rejected funding for his startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on the shopping channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with the competing security firm ADT Corporation.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Rings CEO Jamie Siminoff sagte einmal, dass er das Unternehmen gegründet habe, nachdem er von seiner Garagenwerkstatt aus seine Türklingel nicht hören konnte. Er sagte, dass er eine WLAN-Türklingel gebaut habe. Siminoff sagte, die Verkäufe seien nach seinem Auftritt in einer Folge von „Shark Tank“ im Jahre 2013 stark gestiegen, obwohl die Jury der Sendung die Finanzierung seines Start-ups abgelehnt hatte. Ende 2017 trat Siminoff im Teleshopping-Sender QVC auf. Ring hat außerdem eine Rechtsstreitigkeit mit der konkurrierenden Sicherheitsfirma ADT Corporation beigelegt.
mt: Rings CEO Jamie Siminoff once said he founded the company after not being able to hear his garage door from his workshop. He said he built a Wi-Fi garage door opener. Siminoff said sales increased after his appearance on the reality show Shark Tank in 2013, even though the show's panel rejected funding for his startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on the shopping channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with the competing security firm ADT Corporation.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: "Die PBS-Sendung gewann mehr als zwei Dutzend Emmy-Preise und ihre Laufzeit ist nur kürzer als die Sesamstraße und Mister Roger‘s Neighborhood. Jede Episode der Sendung konzentriert sich auf ein Thema in einem bestimmten Buch und erforscht dieses Thema dann in mehreren Geschichten. Jede Show gab auch Empfehlungen für Bücher, nach denen Kinder Ausschau halten sollten, wenn sie in ihre Bibliothek gehen. ""John Grant von WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbows Heimatstation) sagte: """"Reading Rainbow hat Kindern beigebracht, warum sie lesen sollten, ... die Liebe zum Lesen - [die Show] hat Kinder dazu ermutigt, ein Buch in die Hand zu nehmen und zu lesen."""""" Einige Personen, darunter John Grant, sind der Ansicht, dass sowohl die Finanzierungskrise als auch ein Wandel in der Philosophie des Bildungsfernsehens zum Ende der Serie beigetragen haben."
mt: "The PBS show won more than two dozen Emmy awards and its run was only shorter than Sesame Street and Mister Roger’s Neighborhood. Each episode of the show focused on a theme in a particular book and then explored that theme in several stories. Each show also gave recommendations for books that children should look for when they go to their library. ""John Grant of WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow’s home station) said: ""Reading Rainbow taught children why they should read,... the love of reading - [the show] encouraged children to pick up a book and read it.""" Some people, including John Grant, believe both the funding crisis and a shift in the philosophy of educational television contributed to the end of the series."
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: Beamte der Stadt Amsterdam und des Anne-Frank-Museums geben an, dass der Baum mit einem Pilz infiziert ist und eine Gefahr für die öffentliche Gesundheit darstellt, da er jederzeit umfallen könne. Er hätte am Dienstag gefällt werden sollen, wurde aber durch einen Notfallgerichtsentscheid gerettet.
mt: Officials from the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum say the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health risk, as it could fall at any time. It was supposed to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved by a last-minute court ruling.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: "Die Tierschutzorganisationen Animal Liberation und Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) fordern erneut die Anbringung von Überwachungskameras in allen australischen Schlachthäusern. Der Chefinspektor der RSPCA New South Wales, David O'Shannessy, sagte der ABC, dass die Überwachung und Inspektionen von Schlachthöfen in Australien an der Tagesordnung sein sollten. """"""Die Videoüberwachung würde sicherlich eine klare Botschaft an die Leute senden, die mit Tieren arbeiten, dass ihr Wohlbefinden am allerwichtigsten ist."""""""
mt: "The animal welfare organisations Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the installation of surveillance cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs in Australia should be routine. """"""Video surveillance would certainly send a clear message to people working with animals that their welfare is paramount."""""""
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: Als heute die Bestattungen von Jeff Weise und drei der neun Opfer stattfanden, verbreitete sich die Nachricht von der Verhaftung eines weiteren Schülers in Verbindung mit den Erschießungen an einer Schule am 21. März in der Red-Lake-Gemeinschaft. Die Behörden sagten über die Bestätigung der heutigen Festnahme hinaus offiziell wenig. Eine Quelle, die über Kenntnis der Untersuchung verfügt, teilte der Star Tribune in Minneapolis jedoch mit, dass es sich um Louis Jourdain handelt, den 16-jährigen Sohn des Stammesvorsitzenden des Red Lake-Stammes Floyd Jourdain. Zur Zeit ist nicht bekannt, welche Vorwürfe erhoben werden oder was die Behörden zu dem Jungen geführt hat, aber vor dem Bundesgericht hat ein Jugendverfahren begonnen.
mt: As today's funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims took place, news spread of the arrest of another student in connection with the shootings at a school on March 21 in the Red Lake community. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming the arrest today. A source with knowledge of the investigation told the Star Tribune in Minneapolis that it was Louis Jourdain, the 16-year-old son of Red Lake tribe chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known what charges are being made or what led authorities to the youth, but a juvenile proceeding has begun before federal court.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: Organisatoren des Protests sagten, dass in deutschen Städten wie Berlin, Köln, Hamburg und Hannover rund 100.000 Menschen teilnahmen. In Berlin schätzte die Polizei die Zahl der Demonstranten auf 6.500. Auch in Paris, Sofia in Bulgarien, Vilnius in Litauen, Valletta auf Malta, Tallinn in Estland und in Edinburgh und Glasgow in Schottland gab es Proteste. Etwa 200 Menschen protestierten in London vor den Büros mehrerer großer Urheberrechtsinhaber. Im letzten Monat gab es in Polen große Proteste, als das Land das ACTA unterzeichnete, was dazu führte, dass die polnische Regierung sich entschied, vorerst das Abkommen nicht zu ratifizieren. Sowohl Lettland als auch die Slowakei haben den ACTA-Beitrittsprozess verschoben.
mt: Organizers of the protest said that in German cities like Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg and Hanover around 100,000 people participated. In Berlin the police estimated the number of demonstrators to be 6,500. There were also protests in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valletta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia and in Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. About 200 people protested in London in front of the offices of several major copyright holders. Last month there were large protests in Poland when the country signed the ACTA, which led to the Polish government deciding to postpone ratification of the agreement. Both Latvia and Slovakia have postponed the ACTA accession process.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: "Es wurden über 60 Fälle von Überhitzung bei defekten iPods gemeldet. Insgesamt wurden dadurch sechs Brände ausgelöst und vier Personen haben leichte Verbrennungen erlitten. Das japanische Ministerium für Wirtschaft, Handel und Industrie (METI) gab an, dass ihm 27 Unfälle im Zusammenhang mit den Geräten bekannt waren. ""Letzte Woche gab das METI bekannt, dass es von Apple über 34 weitere Vorfälle von Überhitzung informiert worden war, die das Unternehmen als „nicht schwerwiegend"""" bezeichnete."" Das Ministerium reagierte, indem es die Verschiebung des Berichts durch Apple als „wirklich bedauerlich“ bezeichnete."
mt: 60 cases of overheating in defective iPods have been reported. In total, six fires were caused and four people suffered minor burns. The Japanese Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said it was aware of 27 incidents involving the devices. ""Last week, the METI announced that it had been informed by Apple of 34 additional cases of overheating, which the company described as ""not serious."""" The ministry reacted by calling the delay in Apple's report ""really regrettable"".
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: Apple-CEO Steve Jobs enthüllte das Gerät, indem er die Bühne betrat und das iPhone aus der Tasche seiner Jeans holte. Während seiner zweistündigen Rede erklärte er: „Apple wird heute das Telefon neu erfinden; Wir werden heute Geschichte schreiben“.
mt: Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking on stage and pulling the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his two-hour presentation he explained: "Apple will reinvent the phone today; We will write history today".
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: Die derzeitige Senatorin und argentinische First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner gab gestern Abend in La Plata, einer Stadt 50 Kilometer von Buenos Aires entfernt, ihre Präsidentschaftskandidatur bekannt. Frau Kirchner kündigte ihre Absicht, als Präsidentin zu kandidieren, im Argentinischen Theater an. Dort begann sie 2005 auch ihre Kampagne für den Senat als Mitglied der Delegation der Provinz Buenos Aires.
mt: The current senator and Argentine first lady Cristina Fernández de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy last night in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theater. There she also began her campaign for the Senate as a member of the Buenos Aires delegation in 2005.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Die ACMA befand zudem, dass Big Brother nicht gegen Gesetze zur Zensur von Online-Inhalten verstoßen habe, obwohl das Video übers Internet gestreamt wurde, da es nicht auf der Website von Big Brother gespeichert worden waren. Der Broadcasting Services Act sorgt für eine Regulierung von Online-Inhalten. Um jedoch als Online-Inhalt zu gelten, muss dieser physisch auf einem Server abgelegt sein.
mt: The ACMA also found that Big Brother did not violate laws against online content censorship, although the video was streamed over the Internet, because it was not stored on the Big Brother website. The Broadcasting Services Act regulates online content. However, in order to be considered online content, it must be physically stored on a server.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: "Peter Costello, australischer Schatzmeister und der Mann, der am ehesten die Nachfolge von Premierminister John Howard als Parteivorsitzender der Liberalen antreten wird, hat seine Unterstützung für eine Kernkraftindustrie in Australien zum Ausdruck gebracht. Herr Costello sagte, dass Australien die Nutzung von Atomenergie anstreben solle, sobald deren Erzeugung wirtschaftlich rentabel ist. """"""Wenn es kommerziell verfügbar wird, sollten wir es haben. Ich meine, es gibt keine prinzipiellen Einwände gegen Atomenergie"""", sagte Herr Costello."""
mt: "Peter Costello, Australian Treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as leader of the Liberal Party, has expressed his support for a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said Australia should pursue the use of nuclear power as soon as its generation becomes economically viable. """"""If it's commercially available, we should have it. I mean, there are no principled objections to nuclear power"""", said Mr Costello."
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: Da pro Tag nur achtzehn Medaillen zur Verfügung stehen, hat es ein Anzahl an Ländern nicht auf das Podium geschafft. Dazu gehören die Niederlande, wo Anna Jochemsen gestern im Super-G den neunten Platz im Stand der Damen belegte, und Finnland mit Katja Saarinen, die im selben Wettbewerb den zehnten Platz belegte. Der Australier Mitchell Gourley wurde Elfter im stehenden Super-G der Männer. Der tschechische Konkurrent Oldrich Jelinek wurde Sechzehnter im sitzenden Super-G der Männer. Der Mexikaner Arly Velasquez kam beim Super-G der Herren (sitzend) als fünfzehnter ins Ziel. Der Neuseeländer Adam Hall kam beim Super-G der Herren (stehend) als neunter ins Ziel. Der sehbehinderte polnische Skifahrer Maciej Krezel und die Begleitläuferin Anna Ogarzynska belegten im Super-G den dreizehnten Platz. Der Südkoreaner Jong Seork Park belegte im Super-G der Männer den vierundzwanzigsten Platz.
mt: Because there are only eighteen medals available per day, a number of countries did not make the podium.  This includes the Netherlands, where Anna Jochemsen yesterday finished ninth in the women's standing super-G, and Finland with Katja Saarinen, who finished tenth in the same event.  The Australian Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing super-G.  The Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting super-G.  The Mexican Arly Velasquez finished fifteenth in the men's sitting super-G.  The New Zealander Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing super-G.  The visually impaired Polish skier Maciej Krezel and his guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the super-G.  The South Korean Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's super-G.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: Da pro Tag nur achtzehn Medaillen zur Verfügung stehen, hat es ein Anzahl an Ländern nicht auf das Podium geschafft. Dazu gehören die Niederlande, wo Anna Jochemsen gestern im Super-G den neunten Platz im Stand der Damen belegte, und Finnland mit Katja Saarinen, die im selben Wettbewerb den zehnten Platz belegte. Der Australier Mitchell Gourley wurde Elfter im stehenden Super-G der Männer. Der tschechische Konkurrent Oldrich Jelinek wurde Sechzehnter im sitzenden Super-G der Männer. Der Mexikaner Arly Velasquez kam beim Super-G der Herren (sitzend) als fünfzehnter ins Ziel. Der Neuseeländer Adam Hall kam beim Super-G der Herren (stehend) als neunter ins Ziel. Der sehbehinderte polnische Skifahrer Maciej Krezel und die Begleitläuferin Anna Ogarzynska belegten im Super-G den dreizehnten Platz. Der Südkoreaner Jong Seork Park belegte im Super-G der Männer den vierundzwanzigsten Platz.

src: Der Gerichtsprozess fand am Birmingham Crown Court statt und wurde am 3. August abgeschlossen. Der Moderator, der vor Ort verhaftet wurde, bestritt den Angriff und behauptete, dass er die Stange benutzt habe, um sich selbst vor Flaschen zu schützen, die von bis zu dreißig Leuten auf ihn geworfen worden seien. Blake wurde auch wegen versuchter Behinderung der Justiz verurteilt. Der Richter sagte Blake, es sei „fast unvermeidlich“, dass er ins Gefängnis müsse.
mt: The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and was concluded on 3 August. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he had used the stick to protect himself from bottles thrown by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to impede the course of justice. The judge told Blake that it was "almost inevitable" that he would go to prison.
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: Weitere Themen auf der Tagesordnung in Bali sind die Rettung der noch verbliebenen Wälder der Welt und die gemeinsame Nutzung von Technologien, die den Entwicklungsländern helfen sollen, auf weniger umweltschädliche Weise zu wachsen. Die Vereinten Nationen hoffen zudem, einen Fonds einrichten zu können, der den von der globalen Erwärmung betroffenen Ländern helfen soll, mit den Auswirkungen fertig zu werden. Die Mittel könnte man für hochwassersichere Häuser, eine bessere Wasserverwaltung und Nutzpflanzendiversifizierung verwenden.
mt: Other topics on the agenda in Bali are the rescue of the remaining forests of the world and the joint use of technologies that will help developing countries to grow in a less environmentally damaging way. The United Nations also hopes to be able to set up a fund that will help countries affected by global warming to cope with the effects. The money could be used for flood-resistant homes, better water management and crop diversification.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: Nigeria hat bereits angekündigt, dass es plant in der Woche vor dem Gipfel AfCFTA beizutreten. Der AU-Beauftragte für Handel und Industrie, Albert Muchanga, gab bekannt, dass Benin sich anschließen werde. Der Kommissar sagte: „Wir haben uns noch nicht auf Herkunftsregeln und Zollkonditionen einigen können, aber der Rahmen, den wir entwickelt haben, reicht bereits aus, um am 1. Juli 2020 mit dem Handel zu beginnen.“
mt: Nigeria has already announced that it plans to join the AfCFTA in the week before the summit. The AU trade and industry commissioner, Albert Muchanga, said Benin would join. The commissioner said: “We have not yet agreed on origin rules and customs conditions, but the framework we have developed is already sufficient to start trading on July 1, 2020.”
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: "Während ihrer Zeit in Atlanta wurde sie von Kritikern gelobt und für das innovative städtische Bildungswesen ausgezeichnet.x ""2009 wurde ihr der Titel """"Nationale Schulaufseherin des Jahres"""" verliehen."" Zum Zeitpunkt der Auszeichnung haben Atlantas Schulen die Testergebnisse erheblich verbessert. Kurz darauf veröffentlichte The Atlanta Journal-Constitution einen Bericht, der Probleme bei den Testergebnissen offenlegte.x Der Bericht zeigte, dass die Testergebnisse unwahrscheinlich schnell angestiegen waren, und er stellte die Behauptung auf, die Schule habe intern Probleme festgestellt, aber nicht darauf reagiert. Danach deuteten Beweismittel darauf hin, dass Testpapiere manipuliert worden waren. Hall wurde 2013 zusammen mit 34 anderen Entscheidungsträgern im Bildungswesen angeklagt."
mt: "During her time in Atlanta she was praised and awarded for her innovative city education system.x ""In 2009 she was awarded the title ""National School Superintendent of the Year""."" At the time of the award Atlanta's schools had significantly improved test scores. Shortly thereafter The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report exposing problems with the test scores.x The report showed that the test scores had risen unusually fast, and it suggested that the school had internally identified problems but did not react. Afterward evidence suggested that test papers had been tampered with. Hall was indicted in 2013 along with 34 other education decision makers."
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: Eine Bombe explodierte vor dem Bürogebäude des Generalgouverneurs. Drei weitere Bomben detonierten binnen zwei Stunden unweit von Regierungsgebäuden. Laut einigen Berichten beträgt die offizielle Zahl der Todesopfer acht und offizielle Berichte bestätigen, dass bis zu 30 Personen verletzt wurden. Allerdings sind noch keine endgültigen Zahlen bekannt.
mt: A bomb exploded in front of the office building of the governor. Three more bombs detonated within two hours near government buildings. According to some reports, the official death toll is eight and official reports confirm that up to 30 people were injured. However, no final numbers are known.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: Letztes Jahr, im Januar 2017, wechselte der 21 Jahre alte Jesus vom brasilianischen Club Palmeiras zu Manchester City für eine Transfergebühr, die Berichten zufolge 27 Millionen Pfund betrug. Seitdem trat der Brasilianer in 53 Spielen in allen Wettbewerben für den Verein an und erzielte 24 Tore.
mt: Last year, in January 2017, Jesus, then 21, moved from Brazilian club Palmeiras to Manchester City for a transfer fee, according to reports, of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has played in 53 games in all competitions for the club and scored 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: In Mekka, der heiligen Stadt des Islam, stürzte heute Morgen gegen 10 Uhr Ortszeit ein Hostel ein. Das Gebäude beherbergte etliche Pilger, die zum Besuch der Heiligen Stadt am Vorabend der Hadsch-Pilgerreise kamen. Die Gäste des Hostels waren größtenteils Staatsbürger der Vereinigten Arabischen Emirate. Die Zahl der Todesopfer beläuft sich auf mindestens 15; eine Zahl, die voraussichtlich steigen wird.
mt: In Mecca, the holy city of Islam, a hostel collapsed this morning at around 10 am local time. The building housed several pilgrims who came to visit the holy city the night before the Hajj pilgrimage. The guests of the hostel were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The number of fatalities stands at least at 15; a number that is expected to rise.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: Die Satelliten, die beide mehr als 1.000 Pfund wogen, kollidierten 491 Meilen über der Erde bei einer ungefähren Fluggeschwindigkeit von 17.500 Meilen pro Stunde. Wissenschaftler sagen, dass die Explosion, die durch den Zusammenstoß bewirkt wurde, gewaltig war. Sie versuchen immer noch herauszufinden, wie umfangreich der Zusammenstoß war und wie die Erde davon beeinträchtigt werden wird. Das Strategische Kommando des Verteidigungsministeriums der Vereinigten Staaten macht die Trümmer ausfindig. Das Ergebnis der Plotting-Analyse wird auf einer öffentlichen Website publiziert.
mt: The satellites, both weighing more than 1,000 pounds, collided 491 miles above the Earth at an approximate airspeed of 17,500 miles per hour. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine how extensive the collision was and how the Earth will be affected. The Strategic Command of the United States Department of Defense is tracking the debris. The results of the plotting analysis will be published on a public website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: Batten wurde auf der Liste der 400 reichsten Amerikaner von 2008 mit einem geschätzten Vermögen von 2,3 Milliarden Dollar auf Rang 190 geführt. Er machte im Jahr 1950 seinen Abschluss am College of Arts & Sciences der University of Virginia und war ein bedeutender Stifter dieser Institution.
mt: Batten was listed on the Forbes 400 Richest Americans of 2008 with an estimated net worth of $2.3 billion, ranked 190th. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a major benefactor of that institution.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: Der kalifornische Gouverneur Arnold Schwarzenegger unterzeichnete einen Gesetzentwurf, der den Verkauf oder Verleih von Videospielen, die Gewalt beinhalten, an Minderjährige verbietet. Der Gesetzesvorschlag sieht vor, dass im Bundesstaat Kalifornien verkaufte Videospiele mit einem Aufkleber mit der Zahl „18“ versehen werden und der Verkauf an Minderjährige mit einer Geldbuße von 1000 $ bestraft wird.
mt: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed a bill that prohibits the sale or rental of video games that contain violence to minors. The bill requires that video games sold in California be labeled with an "18" sticker and that the sale of video games to minors be punished with a fine of $1000.
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: "Duvall, verheiratet und zwei erwachsene Kinder, hat keinen großen Eindruck auf Miller gemacht, dem die Geschichte erzählt wurde. ""Als er nach einem Kommentar gefragt wurde, sagte Miller: """"Mike spricht sehr viel während der Anhörung ... ich habe mich vorbereitet und konnte daher nicht richtig hören, was er sagte."""""""
mt: "Duvall, married and two adult children, made no great impression on Miller, who was told the story. ""As he was asked for a comment, Miller said: """"Mike speaks a lot during the hearing... I prepared myself and could not hear what he said correctly."""""""
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: """Premierminister Stephen Harper hat nach einem 25-minütigen Treffen mit NDP-Leader Jack Layton am Dienstag im PMO zugestimmt, den """"Clean Air Act"""" der Regierung an ein Komitee aller Parteien zur Prüfung vor der zweiten Anhörung zu schicken."" Layton hatte während des Treffens mit dem Premierminister Änderungen am Umweltgesetz der Konservativen gefordert und dabei eine „gründliche und vollständige Neufassung“ des Umweltgesetzes der Konservativen Partei verlangt. Nachdem die Bundesregierung eingesprungen ist, um die Finanzierung des Mersey-Krankenhauses in Devonport (Tasmanien) zu übernehmen, haben die Landesregierung und einige Parlamentsmitglieder den Vorgang als PR-Gag im Vorfeld der für November anberaumten Bundeswahl kritisiert. Premierminister John Howard sagte jedoch, die Maßnahme, 45 Millionen australische Dollar bereitzustellen, diene nur dazu, die Krankenhauseinrichtungen vor einer Herabstufung durch die tasmanische Regierung zu bewahren."
mt: """Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the """"Clean Air Act"""" to a committee of all parties for review before the second hearing. NDP Leader Jack Layton met with the Prime Minister for 25 minutes on Tuesday at the PMO. Layton had demanded changes to the Conservative government's environmental legislation and called for a """"thorough and complete re-write"""" of the Conservative Party's environmental legislation. After the federal government stepped in to take over the funding of the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, state government and some parliamentarians have criticized the move as a PR stunt ahead of the November federal election. Prime Minister John Howard said the move, to provide 45 million Australian dollars, was only to save the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government."""
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: """Premierminister Stephen Harper hat nach einem 25-minütigen Treffen mit NDP-Leader Jack Layton am Dienstag im PMO zugestimmt, den """"Clean Air Act"""" der Regierung an ein Komitee aller Parteien zur Prüfung vor der zweiten Anhörung zu schicken."" Layton hatte während des Treffens mit dem Premierminister Änderungen am Umweltgesetz der Konservativen gefordert und dabei eine „gründliche und vollständige Neufassung“ des Umweltgesetzes der Konservativen Partei verlangt. Nachdem die Bundesregierung eingesprungen ist, um die Finanzierung des Mersey-Krankenhauses in Devonport (Tasmanien) zu übernehmen, haben die Landesregierung und einige Parlamentsmitglieder den Vorgang als PR-Gag im Vorfeld der für November anberaumten Bundeswahl kritisiert. Premierminister John Howard sagte jedoch, die Maßnahme, 45 Millionen australische Dollar bereitzustellen, diene nur dazu, die Krankenhauseinrichtungen vor einer Herabstufung durch die tasmanische Regierung zu bewahren."
mt: """Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the """"Clean Air Act"""" to a committee of all parties for review before the second hearing. NDP Leader Jack Layton met with the Prime Minister for 25 minutes on Tuesday at the PMO. Layton had demanded changes to the Conservative government's environmental legislation and called for a """"thorough and complete re-write"""" of the Conservative Party's environmental legislation. After the federal government stepped in to take over the funding of the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, state government and some parliamentarians have criticized the move as a PR stunt ahead of the November federal election. Prime Minister John Howard said the move, to provide 45 million Australian dollars, was only to save the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government."""
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: Sowohl Cyanursäure als auch Melamin wurden in Urinproben von Haustieren gefunden, die nach dem Verzehr kontaminierter Haustiernahrung starben. Die zwei Verbindungen reagieren miteinander und formen Kristalle, die laut Forschern der Hochschule die Nierentätigkeit behindern können. Die Forscher entdeckten Kristalle im Katzenurin, die sich durch die Zugabe von Melamin und Zyanursäure gebildet hatten. Die Zusammensetzung dieser Kristalle entspricht der Zusammensetzung, die im Urin betroffener Haustiere gefunden wurde, wenn man sie mittels Infrarotspektroskopie (FTIR) vergleicht.
mt: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples of pets that died after eating contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with each other and form crystals, according to researchers at the university, which can hinder kidney function. The researchers found crystals in cat urine that had formed when melamine and cyanuric acid were added. The composition of these crystals matches the composition found in the urine of affected pets when compared using infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: "Xinhua berichtete, dass Ermittler der Regierung am Mittwoch zwei „Black Box“-Flugschreiber  geborgen haben. Ringer-Kollegen zollten Luna ebenfalls Tribut. ""Tommy Dreamer sagte: """"Luna war die erste Königin der Extreme. Meine erste Managerin. Luna starb in der Nacht der zwei Monde. Sehr einzigartig, genau wie sie. Eine starke Frau."""""" Dustin „Goldust“ Runnels gab folgenden Kommentar ab: „Luna war genauso verrückt wie ich ... vielleicht sogar noch verrückter ... ich liebe sie und werde sie vermissen ... hoffentlich ist sie an einem besseren Ort.“"
mt: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two "black box" flight recorders on Wednesday. Ringer colleagues also paid tribute to Luna. "Tommy Dreamer said: """"Luna was the first queen of the extremes. My first manager. Luna died on the night of the two moons. Very unique, just like her. A strong woman."""""" Dustin "Goldust" Runnels gave the following comment: "Luna was just as crazy as I... maybe even crazier... I love her and will miss her... hopefully she is in a better place.""
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""
