src: Flugunfälle sind im Iran, der über eine veraltete Flotte verfügt, die sowohl für zivile als auch für militärische Einsätze schlecht gewartet wird, häufig. Internationale Sanktionen haben bewirkt, dass keine neuen Flugzeuge gekauft werden können. Bei einem Hubschrauberabsturz zu Beginn der Woche wurden drei Menschen getötet und drei weitere verletzt. Letzten Monat erfuhr Iran sein schlimmstes Flugzeugunglück seit Jahren, als ein Passagierflugzeug auf dem Weg nach Armenien abstürzte und dabei alle 168 Passagiere ums Leben kamen. Im selben Monat schoss ein weiteres Passagierflugzeug über das Ende einer Landebahn in Maschhad hinaus und stieß mit einer Mauer zusammen, wobei siebzehn Menschen ums Leben kamen.
mt: Plane crashes are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet of aircraft that is poorly maintained for both civilian and military use. International sanctions have meant that no new aircraft can be purchased. Last week, three people were killed and three others injured when a helicopter crashed. Last month, Iran suffered its worst plane crash in years when a passenger jet crashed on its way to Armenia, killing all 168 passengers. In the same month, another passenger jet overshot the end of a runway in Mashhad and crashed into a wall, killing seventeen people.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: Flugunfälle sind im Iran, der über eine veraltete Flotte verfügt, die sowohl für zivile als auch für militärische Einsätze schlecht gewartet wird, häufig. Internationale Sanktionen haben bewirkt, dass keine neuen Flugzeuge gekauft werden können. Bei einem Hubschrauberabsturz zu Beginn der Woche wurden drei Menschen getötet und drei weitere verletzt. Letzten Monat erfuhr Iran sein schlimmstes Flugzeugunglück seit Jahren, als ein Passagierflugzeug auf dem Weg nach Armenien abstürzte und dabei alle 168 Passagiere ums Leben kamen. Im selben Monat schoss ein weiteres Passagierflugzeug über das Ende einer Landebahn in Maschhad hinaus und stieß mit einer Mauer zusammen, wobei siebzehn Menschen ums Leben kamen.
mt: Plane crashes are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet of aircraft that is poorly maintained for both civilian and military use. International sanctions have meant that no new aircraft can be purchased. Last week, three people were killed and three others injured when a helicopter crashed. Last month, Iran suffered its worst plane crash in years when a passenger jet crashed on its way to Armenia, killing all 168 passengers. In the same month, another passenger jet overshot the end of a runway in Mashhad and crashed into a wall, killing seventeen people.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: Die Studiengruppe zum Irak stellte heute um 12:00 Uhr GMT ihren Bericht vor. Er warnt davor, dass niemand garantieren kann, dass irgendeine Vorgehensweise im Irak zu diesem Zeitpunkt die sektiererische Kriegsführung, die wachsende Gewalt oder ein Abgleiten ins Chaos stoppen wird. Der Bericht fängt an mit der Bitte um einen offenen Diskurs und um Konsensbildung in den USA über eine Strategie für den Mittleren Osten. Der Bericht steht fast jedem Aspekt der gegenwärtigen Politik der Exekutive im Hinblick auf den Irak äußerst kritisch gegenüber und drängt auf einen sofortigen Richtungswechsel. Die erste der 78 Empfehlungen ist, dass eine neue diplomatische Initiative vor Ende dieses Jahres ergriffen werden sollte, um die irakischen Grenzen gegenüber feindlichen Interventionen zu sichern und diplomatische Beziehungen mit seinen Nachbarn wiederherzustellen.
mt: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12:00 GMT today. It warns that no one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this time will stop sectarian violence, growing violence or a slide into chaos. The report begins with a call for an open discourse and consensus building in the United States over a strategy for the Middle East. The report is highly critical of the Executive's current policy on Iraq in almost every aspect and urges an immediate change of course. The first of the 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken by the end of this year to secure Iraq's borders against hostile intervention and to restore diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Laut Ansa „war die Polizei wegen einiger Morde in den hohen Rängen besorgt, die, wie sie befürchteten, einen regelrechten Erbfolgekrieg auslösen könnten. Die Polizei sagte, dass Lo Piccolo die Oberhand habe, weil er in Palermo Provenzanos rechte Hand war und seine größere Erfahrung ihm den Respekt der älteren Generationen einbrachte. Diese verfolgten Provenzanos Politik, keine Aufmerksamkeit auf sich zu ziehen, während sie ihr Machtnetzwerk stärkten. Diese Bosse waren von Provenzano im Zaum gehalten worden, als er dem von Riina geführten Krieg gegen den Staat ein Ende setzte, der 1992 das Leben der Mafia-Kreuzritter Giovanni Falcone und Paolo Borsellino forderte.“
mt: According to Ansa, “the police were concerned about a number of murders in the upper ranks, which, as they feared, could trigger a full-scale succession war. The police said that Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he was Provenzano’s right hand in Palermo and his greater experience earned him the respect of the older generations. These were following Provenzano’s policy of not attracting attention, while they strengthened their power network. These bosses were held in check by Provenzano, as he ended the war against the state led by Riina, which in 1992 claimed the lives of the Mafia knights Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino.”
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: Der japanische Judoka Hitoshi Saito, zweifacher olympischer Goldmedaillengewinner, ist im Alter von 54 Jahren gestorben. Als Todesursache wurde intrahepatischer Gallengangkrebs angegeben. Er verstarb am Dienstag in Osaka. Saito war nicht nur ehemaliger Olympiasieger und Weltmeister, sondern bis zu seinem Tod auch der Vorsitzende der Trainingskommission des All Japan Judoverbandes.
mt: 54-year-old Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, a two-time Olympic gold medalist, died. Intrahepatic bile duct cancer was given as the cause of death. He died on Tuesday in Osaka. Saito was not only former Olympic champion and world champion, but until his death also chairman of the training commission of the All Japan Judo Federation.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: Während der Reise geriet Iwasaki bei vielen Gelegenheiten in Schwierigkeiten. Er wurde von Piraten ausgeraubt, in Tibet von einem tollwütigen Hund angegriffen, konnte einer Heirat in Nepal entfliehen und wurde in Indien verhaftet.
mt: During the journey Iwasaki got into trouble many times. He was robbed by pirates, attacked by a rabid dog in Tibet, escaped a marriage in Nepal, and was arrested in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Giancarlo Fisichella verlor die Kontrolle über sein Auto und musste das Rennen schon kurz nach dem Start beenden. Sein Teamkollege führte das Rennen die meiste Zeit an, aber beendete es gleich nach seinem Boxenstopp, wahrscheinlich wegen eines stark eingeklemmten rechten Frontrades. Kurz nach Alonso beendete auch Michael sein aufgrund von Schäden an der Radaufhängung aus den zahlreichen Kämpfen während des Rennens.
mt: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and had to retire early in the race. His teammate led the race for most of the time, but retired after his pit stop, probably due to a severely bent right front wing. Shortly after Alonso retired, Michael did the same due to damage to the suspension from the numerous battles during the race.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: In den letzten drei Monaten wurden über 80 Festgenommene, ohne offizielle Anklage, aus der zentralen Haftanstalt entlassen. Im April dieses Jahres erließ Richter Glynn eine einstweilige Verfügung gegen die Einrichtung, um die Freilassung derjenigen durchzusetzen, die länger als 24 Stunden nach ihrer Verhaftung festgehalten worden waren und keine Anhörung durch einen Gerichtskommissar erhalten hatten. Der Kommissar setzt die Kaution fest, falls sie gewährt wird, und formalisiert die vom festnehmenden Beamten eingereichte Anklage. Die Anklage wird dann in das Computersystem des Bundesstaates eingegeben, wo der Fall verfolgt wird. Die Anhörung markiert auch den Zeitpunkt des Rechts des Beschuldigten auf ein zügiges Gerichtsverfahren.
mt: 80 detainees were released from the central detention facility without official charges in the last three months. In April of this year, Judge Glynn issued a temporary restraining order against the facility to enforce the release of those who had been held for longer than 24 hours after their arrest and had not received a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets the bail, if granted, and formalizes the charge filed by the arresting officer. The charge is then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the point at which the defendant's right to a speedy trial begins.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: Lodin gab weiterhin an, die Entscheidung zur Absage der Stichwahl sei getroffen worden, um den Afghanen die Kosten und das Sicherheitsrisiko einer weiteren Wahl zu ersparen. Diplomaten sagten, sie hätten genug Unklarheit in der afghanischen Verfassung gefunden, um die Stichwahl für unnötig zu befinden. Dies widerspricht früheren Berichten, denen zufolge eine Absage der Stichwahlen verfassungswidrig ist.
mt: Lodin said the decision to cancel the runoff was made to spare Afghans the costs and security risks of another election. Diplomats said they found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to deem the runoff unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports that canceling the runoff would be unconstitutional.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: Seit der Unabhängigkeit Pakistans von der britischen Herrschaft im Jahr 1947 hat der pakistanische Präsident „Politische Agenten“ ernannt, um die FATA zu regieren, die eine nahezu vollständig eigenständige Kontrolle über die Gebiete ausüben. Diese Beamten sind für die Ausübung von exekutiven und judikativen Funktionen nach Artikel 247 der pakistanischen Verfassung verantwortlich.
mt: Since Pakistan's independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani president has appointed "political agents" to govern the FATA, who have near-complete autonomy over the territories. These officials are responsible for the exercise of executive and judicial functions under Article 247 of the Pakistani constitution.
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

Diese Beamten sind für die Ausübung von exekutiven und judikativen Funktionen nach Artikel 247 der pakistanischen Verfassung verantwortlich.

src: Der Film mit Ryan Gosling und Emma Stone hat Nominierungen in allen Hauptkategorien erhalten. Gosling und Stone wurden als bester Schauspieler beziehungsweise beste Schauspielerin nominiert. Weitere Nominierungen gibt es zum Beispiel für den besten Film, die Regie, die Kameraführung, das Kostümbild, den Schnitt, die Original-Filmmusik, das Produktionsdesign, den Tonschnitt, die Tonmischung und das Original-Drehbuch. Zwei Lieder aus dem Kinofilm, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) und City of Stars, bekamen Nominierungen für das beste eigenständige Lied. Lionsgate Studio bekam 26 Nominierungen – mehr als jedes andere Filmstudio.
mt: The film starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone has received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone were nominated for best actor and best actress respectively. Other nominations include best picture, directing, cinematography, costume design, editing, original score, production design, sound editing, sound mixing and original screenplay. Two songs from the film, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, were nominated for best original song. Lionsgate Studio received 26 nominations – more than any other film studio.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Die NHK berichtete zudem, dass das Atomkraftwerk von Kashiwazaki Kariwa in der Präfektur Niigata normal in Betrieb war. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. berichtete, dass das Erdbeben keine Auswirkungen gehabt hatte und dass die Reaktoren Nummer 1 und 2 des Kernkraftwerks Shika abgeschaltet worden waren. Es wird berichtet, dass etwa 9.400 Häuser in der Region kein Wasser und ungefähr 100 keinen Strom haben. Einige Straßen wurden beschädigt und der Eisenbahnverkehr in den betroffenen Gebieten unterbrochen. Der Flughafen Noto in der Präfektur Ishikawa bleibt geschlossen.
mt: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata Prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported that the earthquake had no effect and that the reactors at the Shika nuclear power plant had been shut down. It is reported that about 9,400 homes in the region have no water and about 100 have no electricity. Some roads were damaged and train service in the affected areas was suspended. The Noto airport in Ishikawa Prefecture remains closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: Dem Leak zufolge bezieht sich das Dokument auf den Grenzstreit, in dem die Palästinenser ein Zurücksetzen der Grenzen in den Zustand vor dem Sechstagekrieg von 1967 fordern. Andere Themen, die angeblich abgedeckt sind, umfassen die Zukunft von Jerusalem, das beiden Nationen heilig ist, und das Problem des Jordantals. Israel verlangt  eine Militärpräsenz im Jordantal von zehn Jahren ab der Unterzeichnung der Vereinbarung, die Palästinenserbehörde hingegen will eine solche Präsenz nur für fünf Jahre akzeptieren.
mt: According to the leak, the document concerns the border dispute in which the Palestinians demand a rollback of the borders to the state before the Six-Day War of 1967. Other topics allegedly covered include the future of Jerusalem, which is holy to both nations, and the problem of the Jordan Valley. Israel demands a military presence in the Jordan Valley for ten years after the signing of the agreement, while the Palestinian Authority will only accept such a presence for five years.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: Dem Leak zufolge bezieht sich das Dokument auf den Grenzstreit, in dem die Palästinenser ein Zurücksetzen der Grenzen in den Zustand vor dem Sechstagekrieg von 1967 fordern. Andere Themen, die angeblich abgedeckt sind, umfassen die Zukunft von Jerusalem, das beiden Nationen heilig ist, und das Problem des Jordantals. Israel verlangt  eine Militärpräsenz im Jordantal von zehn Jahren ab der Unterzeichnung der Vereinbarung, die Palästinenserbehörde hingegen will eine solche Präsenz nur für fünf Jahre akzeptieren.
mt: According to the leak, the document concerns the border dispute in which the Palestinians demand a rollback of the borders to the state before the Six-Day War of 1967. Other topics allegedly covered include the future of Jerusalem, which is holy to both nations, and the problem of the Jordan Valley. Israel demands a military presence in the Jordan Valley for ten years after the signing of the agreement, while the Palestinian Authority will only accept such a presence for five years.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: """Ma wurde in Hongkong geboren, studierte an der New York University und der Harvard Law School und war im Besitz einer amerikanischen „Green Card"""" für dauerhaft Ansässige."" Hsieh deutete während der Wahl an, dass Ma während einer Krisenzeit aus dem Land fliehen könnte. Hsieh argumentierte zudem, dass die photogene Ma mehr Stil als Substanz war. Trotz dieser Vorwürfe hat Ma auf einem Podium, das für engere Beziehungen zum chinesischen Festland eintritt, mühelos gewonnen.x"
mt: """Ma was born in Hong Kong, studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and was in possession of an American "Green Card" for permanent residents."" Hsieh indicated during the election that Ma could flee the country during a crisis time. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma had more style than substance. Despite these allegations, Ma won easily on a podium that seeks closer ties to the Chinese mainland.x"""
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: Für die Opfer des Immobilienbetrugs wurde am 20. März im East Bay Community Law Center ein Treffen veranstaltet, nachdem klar wurde, dass zahlreiche Familien nach juristischer Hilfe suchten, um sich gegen die Räumungen zu wehren. Als die Mieter zu erzählen begannen, was ihnen zugestoßen war, wurde den meisten der betroffenen Familien plötzlich klar, das Carolyn Wilson vom OHA ihre Kaution gestohlen und die Stadt verlassen hatte.x Bewohner der Lockwood Gardens glauben, dass weitere 40 Familien oder mehr von Räumungen bedroht sein könnten, seit sie erfahren haben, dass die Polizei der Wohnungsbaubehörde von Oakland (OHA) weitere Wohngebäude untersucht, die vom Wohnungsbetrug betroffen sein könnten.
mt: 20 March, a meeting was held at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the real estate fraud, after it became clear that many families were seeking legal help to fight evictions. As tenants began to tell their stories, it became clear to many of the affected families that Carolyn Wilson from OHA had stolen their deposits and left town.x Residents of Lockwood Gardens believe that another 40 families or more could be threatened with evictions, since they learned that the police of the Oakland Housing Authority (OHA) are investigating other buildings that could be affected by the real estate fraud.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: Nach dem Rennen bleibt Keselowski mit 2.250 Punkten Spitzenreiter in der Fahrerwertung. Mit 2243 Punkten und sieben Punkten Rückstand ist Johnson Zweiter. Auf dem dritten Platz liegt Hamlin 20 Punkte zurück, aber 5 Punkte vor Bowyer. Kahne und Truex Junior belegen mit 2.200 und 2.207 Punkten den fünften und sechsten Platz. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth and Harvick vervollständigen die Top-Ten-Liste der Fahrerwertung bei vier noch ausstehenden Rennen der Saison.
mt: After the race, Keselowski remains the points leader with 2,250 points. Johnson is second with 2,243 points and seven points behind. Hamlin is third, 20 points behind, but five points ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex Jr. are fifth and sixth with 2,200 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth and Harvick complete the top ten driver standings with four races remaining in the season.
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: Es wird davon ausgegangen, dass dies das fünfte Mal in der Geschichte ist, dass Menschen beobachtet haben, was letztlich chemisch nachgewiesene Materie vom Mars ist, die auf die Erde gefallen ist. Von den etwa 24.000 bekannten Meteoriten, die auf die Erde gefallen sind, wurde nur bei 34 eine Herkunft vom Mars bestätigt. 15 dieser Felsen werden mit dem Meteoritenhagel vom letzten Juli in Verbindung gebracht. Einige der Gesteine, die auf der Erde sehr selten sind, werden zwischen 11.000 und 22.500 US-Dollar pro Unze verkauft, was etwa zehnmal so hoch ist wie die Preis von Gold.
mt: It is believed this is the fifth time people have observed what was ultimately chemically confirmed Martian material that fell to Earth. Of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites that have fallen to Earth, only 34 have been confirmed to be from Mars. Fifteen of these rocks are associated with the meteor shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are sold for about $11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times the price of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: Schumacher, der 2006 nach dem siebenfachen Gewinn der Formel-1-Weltmeisterschaft in den Ruhestand gegangen war, sollte den verletzten Felipe Massa ersetzen. Der Brasilianer erlitt 2009 infolge eines Unfalls beim Großen Preis von Ungarn eine schwere Kopfverletzung. Massa wird für den Rest der Saison 2009 ausfallen.
mt: 2006, after winning the Formula-1 World Championship seven times, Schumacher retired. He was supposed to replace Felipe Massa, who suffered a serious head injury in 2009 due to an accident at the Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa will be out for the rest of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: Bisher konnte AOL den IM-Markt aufgrund seiner weit verbreiteten Nutzung in den Vereinigten Staaten in eigenen Tempo bewegen und entwickeln. Mit der Einführung dieser Regelung könnte diese Freiheit enden. Die Zahl der Nutzer der Dienste von Yahoo! und Microsoft zusammengenommen wird mit der Zahl der Kunden von AOL konkurrieren.
mt: So far, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace due to its widespread use in the United States. With the introduction of this regulation, this freedom could end. The number of users of Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will compete with the number of AOL customers.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: Eine Autobombe detonierte am Morgen des gestrigen Tages im Polizeipräsidium des türkischen Gaziantep, tötete zwei Polizisten und verwundete über zwanzig weitere Menschen. Nach Angaben des Gouverneursbüros handelt es sich bei neunzehn der Verletzten um Polizeibeamte. Die Polizei sagte, dass sie einen militanten Anhänger von Daesh (ISIL) hinter dem Angriff vermuten.
mt: A car bomb exploded in the police headquarters of the Turkish Gaziantep on the morning of the previous day, killing two police officers and injuring over twenty other people. According to the governor's office, nineteen of the injured are police officers. The police said they suspect a militant supporter of Daesh (ISIL) was behind the attack.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: "Der ehemalige Gouverneur von Massachusetts, Mitt Romney, gewann am Dienstag die Präsidentschaftsvorwahl der Republikaner in Florida mit über 46 Prozent der Stimmen. Der frühere Sprecher des Repräsentantenhauses der Vereinigten Staaten Newt Gingrich kam mit 32 Prozent auf den zweiten Platz. ""Als ein Bundesstaat nach dem """"Winner takes all""""-Prinzip gab Florida alle fünfzig Wahlmännerstimmen an Romney. Damit beförderte es ihn an die Spitze für das Nominierungsrennen der Republikanischen Partei."""
mt: "Former Massachusetts Governor Mitt Romney won the Republican presidential primary in Florida on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former Speaker of the House of Representatives Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. ""As a state that uses the """"winner takes all"""" system, Florida awarded all fifty delegates to Romney. This put him at the top of the Republican nomination race.""
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

This put him at the top of the Republican nomination race.""

src: "Der ehemalige Sprecher des Repräsentantenhauses Newt Gingrich, der texanische Gouverneur Rick Perry und die Kongressabgeordnete Michele Bachmann erreichten jeweils den vierten, fünften und sechsten Platz. Nachdem die Ergebnisse vorlagen, lobte Gingrich Santorum, fand aber harte Worte für Romney, in dessen Namen in Iowa negative Kampagnenwerbung gegen Gingrich ausgestrahlt worden war. ""Perry erklärte, er werde „nach Texas zurückkehren, um das Ergebnis der Vorwahl von heute Abend auszuwerten und zu entscheiden, ob es in diesem Rennen einen weiterführenden Weg für mich gibt"""", aber sagte später, er werde im Rennen bleiben und bei den Vorwahlen in South Carolina am 21. Januar antreten."" Bachmann, die im August die Ames-Probeumfrage gewann, beschloss, ihren Wahlkampf zu beenden."
mt: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas Governor Rick Perry and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann each finished in fourth, fifth and sixth place. After the results were in, Gingrich praised Santorum, but had harsh words for Romney, whose name was used in Iowa in negative campaign ads against Gingrich. ""Perry said he would ""return to Texas to evaluate the results of tonight's caucuses and decide whether there is a path forward for me in this race"""", but later said he would stay in the race and compete in the South Carolina primary on January 21st."" Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: Die Website des Senders beschreibt die Show als „Radiotheater alter Schule mit einer neuen und unheimlichen schrägen Interpretation!“ In ihren frühen Tagen wurde die Show nur auf der altgedienten Internetradioseite TogiNet Radio gezeigt, eine Site, die den Schwerpunkt auf Talkradio legt. Ende 2015 gründete TogiNet die Nebenstation AstroNet Radio. Die Sendung hatte ursprünglich lokale Amateursynchronsprecher aus Ost-Texas.
mt: The show's website describes it as "radio theater of old school with a new and eerie twisted interpretation!" In its early days, the show was only shown on the venerable Internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site that focuses on talk radio. At the end of 2015, TogiNet founded the satellite station AstroNet Radio. The show originally had local amateur voice actors from East Texas.
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: Die Angreifer von Mumbai kamen am 26. November 2008 mit Hilfe von Booten und brachten Granaten und automatische Waffen mit. Sie trafen mehrere Ziele, einschließlich den vielbesuchten Chhatrapai Shivaji Terminus-Bahnhof und das berühmte Taj Mahal-Hotel. David Headleys Auskundschaften und Informationsbeschaffung hatten dazu beigetragen, die Aktion der 10 Schützen der pakistanischen militanten Gruppe Laskhar-e-Taiba zu ermöglichen. Der Angriff strapazierte die Beziehungen zwischen Indien und Pakistan sehr.
mt: 26 November 2008, the attackers of Mumbai came with the help of boats and brought grenades and automatic weapons. They hit several targets, including the much visited Chhatrapai Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal hotel. David Headley's reconnaissance and information gathering had contributed to the action of the 10 shooters of the Pakistani militant group Lashkar-e-Taiba. The attack strained the relations between India and Pakistan very much.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: Nadals Rekord im direkten Vergleich gegen den Kanadier liegt bei 7:2. Vor kurzem verlor er bei den Brisbane Open gegen Raonic. Nadal sackte 88% der Netzpunkte im Spiel ein, womit er im ersten Aufschlag 76 Punkte gewann. Nach dem Spiel sagte der Sandplatz-König: „Ich freue mich einfach, wieder in den Finalrunden der wichtigsten Turniere zu sein. Ich bin hier, weil ich versuchen will zu gewinnen.“
mt: Nadal's record against Raonic stands at 7-2. Recently he lost to Raonic at the Brisbane Open. Nadal won 76 points in the first serve, winning 88% of the net points in the game. After the game, the sand court king said, "I'm just happy to be in the final rounds of the most important tournaments. I'm here to try to win."
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: Nadals Rekord im direkten Vergleich gegen den Kanadier liegt bei 7:2. Vor kurzem verlor er bei den Brisbane Open gegen Raonic. Nadal sackte 88% der Netzpunkte im Spiel ein, womit er im ersten Aufschlag 76 Punkte gewann. Nach dem Spiel sagte der Sandplatz-König: „Ich freue mich einfach, wieder in den Finalrunden der wichtigsten Turniere zu sein. Ich bin hier, weil ich versuchen will zu gewinnen.“

src: Naked News gab letzte Woche bekannt, sein internationales Mandat für die Berichterstattung in Fremdsprachen mit drei neuen Programmen deutlich auszuweiten. Die globale Organisation, die bereits auf Englisch und Japanisch berichtet, beginnt mit der Ausstrahlung von Programmen auf Spanisch, Italienisch und Koreanisch für Fernsehen, Internet und Mobilgeräte.
mt: Naked News announced last week it is expanding its international mandate for reporting in foreign languages with three new programs. The global organization, which already reports in English and Japanese, is beginning broadcasts of programs in Spanish, Italian and Korean for television, Internet and mobile devices.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: Über die Veranstaltung vom Mittwoch hinaus nahm Carpanedo an der Meisterschaft in zwei Einzelrennen teil. Ihr erstes war der Slalom, bei dem sie in ihrem ersten Lauf ein „Did not Finish“ erhielt. 36 der 116 Teilnehmer erzielten in diesem Rennen das gleiche Ergebnis. Ihr anderes Rennen, den Riesenslalom, beendete sie mit dem 10. Platz in der Damengruppe mit einer kombinierten Laufzeit von 4:41,30. Damit war sie 2:11,60 Minuten langsamer als die erstplatzierte Österreicherin Claudia Lösch und 1:09,02 Minuten schneller als Gyöngyi Dani aus Ungarn, die den neunten Platz belegte. Vier Skifahrerinnen des Krückenskifahrens kamen nicht ins Ziel, und 45 der insgesamt 117 Skifahrerinnen im Riesenslalom konnten sich im Rennen nicht platzieren.
mt: Carpanedo competed in two individual events after Wednesday's event. Her first was the slalom, in which she received a "Did not Finish" in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors received the same result in this race. Her other race, the giant slalom, ended with her tenth place in the women's group with a combined run time of 4:41,30. This was 2:11,60 minutes slower than the first-placed Austrian Claudia Lösch and 1:09,02 minutes faster than Gyöngyi Dani from Hungary, who took ninth place. Four skiers of the Krückenskifahrens did not finish, and 45 of the 117 skiers in the giant slalom could not place in the race.
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: Wegen Bedenken bezüglich COVID-19 suspendierte die National Basketball Association (NBA) der Vereinigten Staaten am Mittwoch die professionelle Basketball-Saison. Die Entscheidung der NBA erfolgte, nachdem ein Spieler von Utah Jazz positiv auf das COVID-19-Virus getestet worden war.
mt: On Wednesday, the National Basketball Association (NBA) of the United States suspended the professional basketball season due to concerns about COVID-19. The NBA's decision came after a Utah Jazz player tested positive for the COVID-19 virus.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: Der Spieler des Tages ist heute Alex Ovechkin von den Washington Capitals. Beim 5:3-Sieg Washingtons gegen die Atlanta Thrashers machte er 2 Tore und 2 Assists. Ovechkins erster Assist des Abends führte zum Siegestreffer des Neulings Nicklas Backstrom; Sein zweites Tor des Abends war sein sechzigstes der Saison, womit er der erste Spieler mit 60 oder mehr Toren in einer Saison seit 1995-96 ist, als Jaromir Jagr und Mario Lemieux diesen Meilenstein erreichten.
mt: The player of the day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. In Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers, he scored two goals and two assists. Ovechkin's first assist of the night led to the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, making him the first player with 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux reached this milestone.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: Die Northern-Rock-Bank war 2008 verstaatlicht worden, nachdem lautbar geworden war, dass die Firma eine Notfallunterstützung von der britischen Regierung bekommen hatte. Northern Rock hatte aufgrund seiner finanziellen Belastung während der Subprime-Hypothekenkrise 2007 Unterstützung benötigt. Das Angebot von Sir Richard Bransons Virgin Group an die Bank wurde vor der Verstaatlichung der Bank abgelehnt. Die Großbank Northern Rock plc wurde im Jahre 2010, während sie sich im Staatseigentum befand, von der „Bad Bank“ Northern Rock (Asset Management) abgelöst. Virgin hat nur die „gute Bank“ von Northern Rock aufgekauft, nicht die Vermögensverwaltungsgesellschaft.
mt: 2008, the Northern Rock Bank was nationalized after it was revealed that the company had received emergency support from the British government. Northern Rock had needed support due to its financial burden during the 2007 subprime mortgage crisis. The offer from Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group to the bank was rejected before the bank was nationalized. The Northern Rock plc, the large bank, was replaced in 2010, while it was in state ownership, by the "bad bank" Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin only bought the "good bank" of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: Die Entscheidung von Rudd, das Klimaabkommen von Kyoto zu unterzeichnen, isoliert die Vereinigten Staaten, die nun die einzige entwickelte Nation sind, die dem Abkommen nicht zustimmen. Australiens ehemalige konservative Regierung weigerte sich, Kyoto zu ratifizieren, mit der Begründung, es würde der Wirtschaft mit seiner starken Abhängigkeit von Kohleexporten schaden, während Länder wie Indien und China nicht an Emissionsziele gebunden seien.
mt: Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate change agreement isolates the United States, which is now the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, arguing it would harm the economy with its strong dependence on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: Die Schützen des begleitenden Versuchs zur Eindämmung der Plage sollten eng von Rangern beaufsichtigt werden, da der Versuch überwacht und seine Wirksamkeit beurteilt wurde. Im Rahmen einer Partnerschaft zwischen NPWS und der Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc. wurden im Rahmen des Jagdprogramms der Sporting Shooters Association qualifizierte Freiwillige rekrutiert. Laut Mick O‘Flynn, dem geschäftsführenden Direktor von Park Conservation and Heritage im NPWS, erhielten die vier für die erste Jagdoperation ausgewählten Schützen umfassenden Sicherheits- und Trainingsunterricht.
mt: The shooters of the accompanying trial to control the plague should be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness assessed. As part of a partnership between NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc., qualified volunteers were recruited under the Sporting Shooters Association’s hunting program. According to Mick O‘Flynn, the executive director of Park Conservation and Heritage at NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first hunting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: „Auf Grundlage dieses Fossils lässt sich sagen, dass die Trennung viel früher stattgefunden hat, als durch molekulare Belege erwartet wurde“ Das bedeutet, dass alles vordatiert werden muss“, sagte Berhane Asfaw, Forscher am Rift Valley Research Service in Äthiopien und Mitverfasser der Studie.
mt: “Based on this fossil, it can be said that the split occurred much earlier than expected by molecular evidence,” Asfaw said. “This means everything needs to be pushed back.”
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: Bei der Keynote-Präsentation der Tokyo Game Show am Donnerstag enthüllte Nintendo-Präsident Satoru Iwata das Controller-Design für die neue Nintendo Revolution-Konsole des Unternehmens. Ähnlich einer TV-Fernbedienung verwendet der Controller zwei Sensoren, die in der Nähe des Fernsehers des Benutzers platziert werden, um dessen Position im dreidimensionalen Raum zu triangulieren. Dies wird Spielern ermöglichen Aktionen und Bewegungen in Videospielen zu steuern, indem sie das Gerät in der Luft bewegen.
mt: At the keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show on Thursday, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the new Nintendo Revolution console. Similar to a TV remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate his position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device in the air.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: Zuvor meldete die chinesische Nachrichtenagentur Xinhua die geplante Entführung eines Flugzeugs. Spätere Berichte gaben dann an, das Flugzeug habe eine Bombendrohung erhalten und sei nach Afghanistan umgeleitet worden, wo es in Kandahar gelandet sei. Erste Berichte besagen, dass das Flugzeug zurück nach Afghanistan umgeleitet wurde, nachdem ihm die Notlandung in Ürümqi verweigert wurde.
mt: Earlier, the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported the planned hijacking of a plane. Later reports said the plane had received a bomb threat and was diverted to Afghanistan, where it landed in Kandahar. Initial reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: Am Montag gab Sara Danius, Ständige Sekretärin des Literaturnobelpreiskomitees der Schwedischen Akademie in einer Radiosendung auf Sveriges Radio in Schweden bekannt, dass das Komitee seine Bemühungen eingestellt habe, Bob Dylan über seine Ehrung mit dem Literaturnobelpreis für Literator zu informieren, nachdem es nicht gelungen war, ihn persönlich zu erreichen. Danius sagte: „Im Moment unternehmen wir nichts. Ich habe seinen engsten Mitarbeiter angerufen und ihm E-Mails geschickt und sehr freundliche Antworten erhalten. Das ist vorläufig genug.“
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy, announced in a radio broadcast on Sveriges Radio in Sweden that the committee had stopped its efforts to inform Bob Dylan of his award of the Nobel Prize in Literature for Literature, after it had failed to reach him personally. Danius said: "At the moment we are doing nothing. I have called his closest assistant and sent him e-mails and very friendly answers have been received. That is enough for now."
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: "U.S.-Präsident George W. Bush begrüßte die Bekanntgabe. ""Bush-Sprecher Gordon Johndroe nannte das Versprechen Nordkoreas „einen wichtigen Schritt in Richtung des Ziels, die verifizierbare Entnuklearisierung der koreanischen Halbinsel zu erreichen."""""""
mt: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. ""Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""an important step toward the goal of verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: 1956 ging Słania nach Schweden, wo er drei Jahre später anfing, im Büro der Schwedischen Post zu arbeiten und er wurde dort der leitende Graveur. Er stellte über 1.000 Briefmarken für Schweden und 28 weitere Länder her. Die Qualität und Präzision seiner Arbeit werden so hoch geschätzt, dass sein Name zu den sehr wenigen allgemein bekannten Namen im Bereich der Philatelie zählt. Manche Sammler sind ausschließlich auf seine Arbeit spezialisiert. Seine tausendste Briefmarke, aus dem Jahr 2000,  zeigt das prächtige Gemälde „Rühmliche Heldentaten schwedischer Könige“ von David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl und ist im Guinness-Buch der Rekorde verzeichnet. Er war auch am Stechen von Geldscheinen für viele Länder beteiligt. Aktuelle Beispiele seiner Arbeit schließen die Premierministerportraits auf der Vorderseite der kanadischen 5- und 100-Dollarnoten ein.
mt: 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where he began working in the office of the Swedish Post three years later and became the leading engraver. He designed over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. The quality and precision of his work is so highly regarded that his name is among the very few generally known names in the field of philately. Some collectors are exclusively specialized on his work. His thousandth stamp, from the year 2000, shows the magnificent painting "Glorious Deeds of Swedish Kings" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl and is listed in the Guinness Book of Records. He was also involved in the engraving of banknotes for many countries. Current examples of his work include the portraits of the prime ministers on the front of the Canadian 5- and 100-dollar bills.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: 800 Meilen der Trans-Alaska-Pipeline wurden nach dem Auslaufen von Tausenden von Fässern Rohöl südlich von Fairbanks, Alaska, stillgelegt. Ein Stromausfall nach einer routinemäßigen Prüfung des Systems zur Feuerbekämpfung führte in der Nähe der Pumpstation 9 von Fort Greely zum Öffnen von Überdruckventilen und zum Überlaufen von Rohöl. Die Ventilöffnung ermöglichte eine Druckentlastung für das System, und Öl floss auf einem Schmierkissen zu einem Tank, der 55 000 Fässer (2,3 Millionen Gallonen) halten kann. Nach Stand vom Mittwochnachmittag, waren die Tankventile immer noch undicht, wahrscheinlich aufgrund einer thermischen Expansion aus dem Inneren des Tanks. Ein weiterer sekundärer Eindämmungsbereich unterhalb der Tanks, der 104.500 Barrel fassen kann, war noch nicht bis zur vollen Kapazität gefüllt.
mt: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline were shut down south of Fairbanks, Alaska, after thousands of barrels of crude oil leaked from near Pump Station 9 at Fort Greely. A power outage during a routine test of the fire suppression system caused the opening of pressure relief valves and the leaking of oil. The valve opening allowed pressure relief for the system, and oil flowed onto a sump pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking, likely due to thermal expansion from inside the tank. A secondary containment area below the tanks, which can hold 104,500 barrels, was not yet filled to capacity.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: Der US-amerikanische Ingenieurskorps schätzte , dass 6 Zoll Regen die schon zuvor beschädigten Dämme brechen lassen könnten. Der Ninth Ward, der während des Hurrikans Katrina bis zu 20 Fuß hoch überflutet war, führt derzeit hüfthohes Wasser, da der nahe gelegene Deich überspült wurde. Auf einem 100 Fuß langen Teilabschnitt läuft Wasser über den Damm.
mt: The American engineering corps estimated that 6 inches of rain could cause levees already damaged by the storm to break. The Ninth Ward, which was flooded up to 20 feet high during Hurricane Katrina, is currently carrying knee-deep water, as the nearby levee was breached. Water is flowing over a 100-foot section of the levee.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Hamilton bestätigte, dass das Krankenhaus der Howard University den Patienten in stabilem Zustand aufgenommen hat. Der Patient hatte sich in Nigeria aufgehalten, wo einige Fälle des Ebolavirus auftraten. Das Krankenhaus befolgte Protokolle zum Infektionsschutz, einschließlich der Trennung des Patienten von anderen, um die Infektion Dritter zu vermeiden.
mt: Hamilton confirmed that the Howard University Hospital had admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been in Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus had occurred. The hospital followed infection control protocols, including the isolation of the patient from others to prevent the infection of others.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: Kometen waren möglicherweise eine Quelle für die Wasserversorgung der Erde, zusammen mit organischer Materie, die Proteine bilden und Leben ermöglichen kann. Da Kometen vor langer Zeit mit der Erde zusammenprallten, versprechen sich die Wissenschaftler Einblicke, wie Planeten, insbesondere die Erde, entstehen.
mt: Comets may have been a source of water for Earth, along with organic matter that can form proteins and enable life. As comets collided with Earth long ago, scientists hope to gain insight into how planets, especially Earth, form.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: Obgleich die Behörden Zweifel an der Glaubwürdigkeit der Drohung haben, hat die Verkehrsbehörde von Maryland die Sperrung auf Drängen des FBI veranlasst. Muldenkipper wurden eingesetzt, um die Eingänge der U-Bahn zu blockieren. 80 Polizisten waren zur Stelle, um die Autofahrer umzuleiten. Vom Ring, der Ausweichroute der Stadt, wurden keine großen Verkehrsbehinderungen berichtet.
mt: Although authorities have doubts about the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportation Authority has closed the station on the request of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block the entrances of the subway. 80 police officers were on hand to reroute drivers. No major traffic delays were reported on the Beltway, the city's alternate route.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: Der Fotograf wurde in das Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center gebracht, wo er anschließend verstarb. Berichten zufolge war er in seinen 20er Jahren. In einer Stellungnahme sagte Bieber: „Obwohl ich bei diesem tragischen Unfall weder anwesend noch direkt an ihm beteiligt war, sind meine Gedanken und Gebete bei der Familie des Opfers“. Die Unterhaltungsnachrichten-Webseite TMZ hat erfahren, dass der Fotograf sein Fahrzeug auf der anderen Seite des Sepulveda Boulevards anhielt und versuchte, Fotos von der Polizeikontrolle zu machen, bevor er die Straße überquerte und weitermachte, was den Polizeibeamten der California Highway Patrol, der die Verkehrskontrolle durchführte, veranlasste, ihn zweimal zurück über die Straße zu beordern. Laut Polizei wird der Fahrer des Fahrzeugs, das den Fotografen angefahren hat, wahrscheinlich nicht angeklagt werden.
mt: The photographer was taken to the Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center where he later died. Reports say he was in his 20s. In a statement Bieber said, "While I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim, as well as my fellow crew and colleagues, who were unlucky enough to have been present for this unfortunate accident." The entertainment news website TMZ has learned that the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of the Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take photos of the police stop before crossing the street and continuing, which prompted the California Highway Patrol officer conducting the traffic stop to order him twice to return across the street. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that struck the photographer will likely not be charged.
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: "Arias wurde positiv auf einen milden Fall des Virus getestet, sagte der Präsidentschaftsminister. Der Zustand des Präsidenten ist stabil, wenngleich er mehrere Tage zu Hause in Isolation verbringen wird. """"""Abgesehen vom Fieber und den Halsschmerzen fühle ich mich gut und in guter Verfassung, um von Zuhause aus zu arbeiten."" Ich gehe davon aus, am Montag zu allen meinen Verpflichtungen zurückzukehren“, sagte Arias in einer Stellungnahme."
mt: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, the presidential minister said. The president's condition is stable, though he will spend several days at home in isolation. """"""Aside from the fever and sore throat, I feel well and in good health to work from home."" I expect to return to all my duties on Monday," said Arias in a statement."
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: Auf seinem Höhepunkt erreichte der Tropensturm Gonu, der nach einer Tasche aus Palmenblättern in der Sprache der Malediven benannt wurde, eine maximale Geschwindigkeit von 240 Kilometern pro Stunde (149 Meilen pro Stunde). Heute früh betrug die Windgeschwindigkeit rund 83 km/h und es wurde erwartet, dass diese weiter abnehmen würde.
mt: At its peak, the tropical storm Gonu, named after a purse made of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached a maximum speed of 240 kilometers per hour (149 miles per hour).  Early this morning, the wind speed was about 83 km/h and it was expected to decrease further.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

Heute früh betrug die Windgeschwindigkeit rund 83 km/h und es wurde erwartet, dass diese weiter abnehmen würde.

src: Die Algenblüte wird von einer höher als gewöhnlichen Konzentration von Karenia brevis verursacht, einem natürlich auftretenden Meereseinzeller. Natürliche Faktoren können zusammenwirken, um ideale Bedingungen zu schaffen, wodurch die Anzahl dieser Algen dramatisch ansteigt. Die Algen produzieren ein Nervengift, das Nerven sowohl beim Menschen als auch bei Fischen deaktivieren kann. Fische sterben oft aufgrund der hohen Konzentrationen des Giftes in den Gewässern. Menschen können durch das Einatmen von betroffenem Wasser beeinträchtigt werden, das durch Wind und Wellen in die Luft gerät.
mt: The algal bloom is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally occurring marine microbe. Natural factors can work together to create ideal conditions, causing the number of these algae to dramatically increase. The algae produce a neurotoxin that can deactivate nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die due to the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by inhaling affected water that is blown into the air by wind and waves.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: "Felicia, einst ein Kategorie 4-Sturm auf der Saffir-Simpson-Hurrikanskala, schwächte sich zu einem tropischen Tiefdruckgebiet ab, bevor sie sich am Dienstag auflöste. Seine Überreste sorgten für Schauer auf den meisten Inseln, allerdings wurden bisher keine Schäden oder Überflutungen gemeldet. ""Der auf Oahu gemessene Niederschlag von 6,34 Zoll wurde als „vorteilhaft"""" bezeichnet."" Einige der Regenfälle wurden von Gewittern und häufigen Blitzen begleitet."
mt: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson hurricane scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating on Tuesday. Its remnants brought showers to most islands, but no damage or flooding has been reported so far. ""The 6.34 inches of rain measured on Oahu was described as "beneficial""""."" Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: Piquet Junior hatte beim Grand Prix von Singapur im Jahr 2008 direkt nach einem frühen Boxenstopp von Fernando Alonso einen Unfall, was zum Einsatz des Safety Cars führte. Als die Autos vor Alonso hinter dem Safety-Car zum Tanken einfuhren, rückte er im Feld auf und holte sich den Sieg. Piquet Jr. wurde nach dem Ungarischen Grand Prix in 2009 gefeuert.
mt: Piquet Jr. had a crash at the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix immediately after an early pit stop by Fernando Alonso. As the cars behind Alonso were pitting, he moved up the field and took the win. Piquet Jr. was fired after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: Eine Studie, die am Donnerstag in der Zeitschrift Science veröffentlicht wurde, berichtete von der Entstehung einer neuen Vogelspezies auf den ecuadorianischen Galápagos-Inseln. Forscher der Princeton University in den Vereinigten Staaten und der Uppsala University in Schweden berichteten, die neue Art habe sich innerhalb von nur zwei Generationen entwickelt, obwohl man zuvor angenommen hatte, dass dieser Vorgang aufgrund der Paarung zwischen einem einheimischen Darwinfink, Geospiza fortes, und dem eingewanderten Kaktusfink, Geospiza conirostris, viel länger dauerte.
mt: A study published Thursday in the journal Science reported the creation of a new bird species on Ecuador's Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species developed within just two generations, although it was previously thought to take much longer due to breeding between a native Darwin's finch, Geospiza fortes, and the invasive cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: Die künstlerische Veranstaltung ist auch Teil einer Kampagne des Bukarester Rathauses, welches das Image der rumänischen Hauptstadt als kreative und farbenfrohe Metropole erneuern will. Die Stadt wird die erste Stadt Südosteuropas sein, die zwischen Juni und August dieses Jahres die CowParade veranstaltet, die größte öffentliche Kunstveranstaltung der Welt.
mt: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall, which wants to renew the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colorful metropolis. Bucharest will be the first city in Southeast Europe to host the CowParade between June and August this year, the largest public art event in the world.
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: Das Flugzeug war auf dem Weg nach Irkutsk und wurde von Truppen des russischen Innenministeriums betrieben. Es wurde eine Untersuchung zur Aufklärung des Unfalls eingeleitet. Die Il-76 ist seit den 1970er Jahren ein Hauptbestandteil sowohl des russischen als auch des sowjetischen Militärs und hatte im vergangenen Monat bereits einen schweren Unfall in Russland erlebt. Am 7. Oktober löste sich beim Start ein Triebwerk, es wurde allerdings niemand verletzt. Nach diesem Unfall setzte Russland die Il-76 kurzzeitig außer Dienst.
mt: The aircraft was en route to Irkutsk and was operated by troops of the Russian Interior Ministry. An investigation has been launched to clarify the cause of the accident. The Il-76 has been a mainstay of both the Russian and Soviet militaries since the 1970s and had experienced a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7, a propeller fell off during takeoff, but no one was injured. Following this accident, Russia temporarily grounded the Il-76.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: Vor den Simpsons hatte Simon an mehreren Shows in verschiedenen Funktionen gearbeitet. In den 1980er Jahren arbeitete er an Shows wie „Taxi“, „Cheers“ und „Die Tracey Ullman Show“. 1989 half er Brooks und Groening bei der Erschaffung von „Die Simpsons“ und war verantwortlich für die Einstellung des ersten Autorenteams der Sendung. Obwohl er die Show 1993 verließ, behielt er den Titel des Chefproduzenten und erhielt weiterhin in jeder Saison Lizenzgebühren in zweistelliger Millionenhöhe.
mt: Before the Simpsons, Simon worked on several shows in various capacities. In the 1980s, he worked on shows like "Taxi," "Cheers," and "The Tracey Ullman Show." In 1989, he helped Brooks and Groening create "The Simpsons" and was responsible for hiring the first writing staff of the show. Although he left the show in 1993, he retained the title of executive producer and continued to receive licensing fees in the millions.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: Fluke schrieb, dass die Anstrengungen einiger, Frauen, die über die Gesundheit von Frauen sprechen wollten, zu übertönen, nicht erfolgreich waren. Zu dieser Schlussfolgerung kam sie aufgrund der zahlreichen positiven Kommentare und der Ermutigung, die sie sowohl von Männern als auch von Frauen erhielt, die darauf drängten, dass Verhütungsmittel als medizinische Notwendigkeit angesehen werden sollten.
mt: Fluke wrote that the efforts of some women who wanted to speak about women's health were not successful. She came to this conclusion because of the numerous positive comments and encouragement she received from both men and women who urged that contraceptives be seen as a medical necessity.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.
